Speak Up® for a better workplace


Everything we do at Chalhoub Group is built on the firm foundations of ethics and integrity to create a safe, respectful, and transparent workplace for all. One of the keyways we uphold this commitment is through Speak Up®.

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/fZ4ObtYI8E-rji-JaTqxoA/550623/439E653A206523EC789B73A1D7FBBAA1/74j09445.jpg> 	

What is Speak Up®?

Speak Up® is a safe and confidential third-party platform for you to report concerns and breaches of our Code of Ethics in our workplace. It ensures that all matters are dealt with anonymously, and in an unbiased, timely, and sensitive manner.

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/fZ4ObtYI8E-rji-JaTqxoA/550622/BB0EFD746FA7B5F772C1E26D6F640E69/74j00002.jpg>

Speak Up® is a safe and confidential third-party platform for you to report concerns and breaches of our Code of Ethics in our workplace. It ensures that all matters are dealt with anonymously, and in an unbiased, timely, and sensitive manner.

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/fZ4ObtYI8E-rji-JaTqxoA/550622/BB0EFD746FA7B5F772C1E26D6F640E69/74j00002.jpg> 	

When to Use Speak Up®

Sometimes it’s hard to know when to report a situation. If you don’t feel comfortable sharing your concerns with your manager, People Partner or HR ops, you can use Speak-Up. Here are some common scenarios where Speak-Up® might be helpful:

- Harassment, Discrimination or Microaggressions: If you or a colleague faces verbal or physical harassment, bullying, or discrimination—whether it’s a noticeable incident or a subtle microaggression.

- Conflicts of Interest: In cases of favoritism, bribery, or undisclosed family ties in business decisions.

- Unethical Workplace Behavior: Misuse of data and resources, theft, or any inappropriate behavior that threatens the Group’s values.

- Feedback for improvement: Working conditions, health and safety issues, or processes and procedures

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/fZ4ObtYI8E-rji-JaTqxoA/550624/E4095445165BE0788D1B34ACDD53592C/uae_boh10.jpg> 	

Confidentiality and Anonymity

We deal with all situations with complete discretion, respect, and sensitivity. This applies to everyone involved in a Speak Up® case: you as the initial messenger, the witnesses, and the reported person.

We deal with all situations with complete discretion, respect, and sensitivity. This applies to everyone involved in a Speak Up® case: you as the initial messenger, the witnesses, and the reported person.

Confidentiality and trust go both ways: We trust that you will raise concerns in good faith and refrain from sharing this information with others and you trust us to deal with them in the right way. Know that outcomes will never be announced publicly nor directly to the initial messengers.

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/fZ4ObtYI8E-rji-JaTqxoA/550625/01D22B3CC1BC24DEE8A00D55F94905D8/ksa_boh3.jpg> 	

Our Zero-Tolerance Stance on Retaliation

We strictly enforce a Non-Retaliation Policy, so if you speak up—no matter the issue—you won’t face any negative consequences. Retaliation is never tolerated, and we act immediately to prevent and address it. If you see something, say something—our policies and leadership are here to protect and support you every step of the way.

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/fZ4ObtYI8E-rji-JaTqxoA/550626/EFAF3F48F095050F89C553FA6074F12C/74j09588.jpg>
